original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi
siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā āpatti sattannam samathānam katihi samathehi sammati

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati—
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā āpatti sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi sammati

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
analyzed: siyā sammukhā vinayena ca paṭiññāta karaṇena ca siyā sammukhā vinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca ati
